scene_description_enriched: A celestial figure, clad in a blue robe with a gold cape, stands with arms raised, emanating golden rays and surrounded by a starry blue background. Below, a figure in a red robe kneels with hands clasped in prayer. To the right, three bearded men in brown robes are also kneeling, looking upwards towards the celestial figure. The scene takes place on a grassy ground with sparse vegetation.
scene_interpretation: The scene likely depicts a divine revelation or a vision, possibly the Transfiguration or a similar moment of divine manifestation, where a heavenly being appears to mortals. The golden rays and starry background emphasize the divine nature of the central figure, while the kneeling figures represent supplication and awe.
